snippet: A drone model from DJI comes with a camera, GPS positioning and other features meant for producing high-quality still images and video.
abstract: Gadgetwise column reviews Phantom 2 Vision Plus, made by company DJI, drone designed to allow users to take photos and videos.
lead_paragraph: A drone model from DJI comes with a camera, GPS positioning and other features meant for producing high-quality still images and video.

headline.print_headline: An Eye in the Sky, Accessible to the Hobbyist
headline.seo: A Teardown of the Phantom 2 Vision Plus Drone from DJI
headline.main: An Eye in the Sky, Accessible to the Hobbyist
